StyleIntent: Create clean, modern, professional concept explanation graphics with clear visual hierarchy, generous white space, and friendly approachable aesthetics suitable for presentations and documentation.

BlendSources.Original: Clean Professional Presentation Style (modern graphics, warm hospitality, delightful details)

DesignPrinciples.ClarityFirst: Visual explanations must be immediately understandable
DesignPrinciples.VisualHierarchy: Guide the eye through concepts in logical order
DesignPrinciples.AccessibleDesign: Work for diverse audiences and contexts
DesignPrinciples.DelightfulDetail: Add small, unexpected moments of visual interest
DesignPrinciples.CleanlinessIsVirtue: Crisp, organized, uncluttered layouts with breathing room
DesignPrinciples.ConceptFocused: Every element serves the explanation; no decorative clutter

Background.Role: Clean white background; primary canvas for all content

PrimaryColors.Name: Deep Blue
PrimaryColors.Role: Structural color; headlines, major elements, strong graphic accents

PrimaryColors.Name: Accent Blue
PrimaryColors.Role: Primary accent; key emphasis, interactive elements, highlights

SecondaryColors.Name: Success Green
SecondaryColors.Role: Positive indicators, success states, growth concepts
SecondaryColors.UsageGuidance: Use for positive outcomes or confirmations

SecondaryColors.Name: Warning Amber
SecondaryColors.Role: Caution indicators, attention areas, energy concepts

SecondaryColors.Name: Neutral Gray
SecondaryColors.Role: Secondary text, borders, subtle backgrounds, supporting elements
SecondaryColors.UsageGuidance: Functional neutral; body text and structure

AccentUsage.Placement: Key concepts, focal points, important relationships

ColorUsageRules.Notes: Maintain clean, professional palette. Colors should aid understanding, not distract. White space is generous.

PrimaryTypeface.Name: Clean Sans Serif
PrimaryTypeface.CharacterTraits: Friendly, approachable, modern, clean, highly readable

TypographyPrinciples.Alignment: Clean and organized; typically left-aligned or centered with purpose

GlobalTextPolicy.TextVolume: Moderate; sufficient for clarity, never crowded

GraphicDevices.Highlights: Subtle shadows or glows for emphasis

LayoutPrinciples.Hierarchy: Clear visual flow; guide the eye through concepts
LayoutPrinciples.Breathing: Elements have room; never cramped or cluttered

PromptRecipe.StylePrefix: Clean, professional concept explanation graphic. Modern digital illustration style with generous white space, clear visual hierarchy, and friendly approachable aesthetics.
PromptRecipe.CoreStylePrompt: modern professional illustration, clean sans-serif typography influence, clean lines, organized layout, bright even lighting, clear visual hierarchy, generous breathing room, concept-focused design, accessible and understandable
PromptRecipe.ColorConstraintPrompt: professional color palette: Deep Blue (#1E3A5F) for structure, Accent Blue (#3B82F6) for emphasis, optional Success Green (#10B981) and Warning Amber (#F59E0B) for semantic meaning, Neutral Gray (#64748B) for supporting elements, white (#FFFFFF) background with generous margins; no neon, no muddy colors, no harsh clashing combinations
PromptRecipe.TextEnforcementPrompt: Text must be perfectly legible, correctly spelled, and grammatically correct. Use clean sans serif typography. Allow generous spacing. Headlines in Deep Blue or Accent Blue.
PromptRecipe.NegativePrompt: cluttered, messy, dirty, muddy colors, neon, garish, gradients, 3D effects, bevels, glows, script fonts, ornate decoration, cramped spacing, low contrast, hard to read, garbled text, typos, dark backgrounds, grungy textures, photorealistic, overly detailed, busy patterns
QualityChecklist: Generous white space; layout feels clean and organized
Clear visual hierarchy guides the eye through concepts
Colors used strategically to aid understanding
Typography is clean, friendly, and perfectly legible
No clutter; every element serves the explanation
